lead_paragraph: Marine Le Pen, the National Front leader and a presidential candidate, has seized on Britain’s vote to leave the European Union to press the case for a referendum in France.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Melissa Eddy and Victor Homola from Berlin, Elisabetta Povoledo from Rome and Benoît Morenne from Paris.

headline.print_headline: France’s Far Right Seizes Opportunity in Anti-Establishment Anger
headline.main: France’s Far Right Sees an Opportunity in ‘Brexit’

snippet: Marine Le Pen, the National Front leader and a presidential candidate, has seized on Britain’s vote to leave the European Union to press the case for a referendum in France.
